DESCRIPTION: Set a language to be used by your server. If you use this command in a direct message to the bot, it will set the language for your user account directly.
INVALID: The language you provided was invalid. The valid languages that are support are as follows: `{{names}}`
INCOMPLETE: {{name}} is not fully translated yet. You can help translate TypicalBot at {{link}}.
UPDATED_GUILD: {{name}} has been set as the default language for this server.
SET_LANGUAGE: Change the default language for this server.
VIEW_LANGUAGES: View a list of all available languages that are supported by the bot.
